narrations.speaker: BigJoe
narrations.text: Evening Ms. Hart. Working late again? There's a young girl over in the corner there that was asking about you before.

narrations.speaker: SnowOwl
narrations.text: You must be Mouse. You ready for this?

narrations.speaker: Mouse
narrations.text: <color='#B0B0B0'>Am I ready for this? Who was this girl? She barely looked old enough to step into the bar. Just what I wanted tonight, babysitting some kid.</color>

narrations.speaker: SnowOwl
narrations.text: Of course. <color='#B0B0B0'>She can barely keep the smug look off her face</color>
